product_name: CliniqueAll About Clean Foaming Face Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique All About Clean Foaming Face Cleanser gently, effectively cleanses skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination (Skin Type II)Creamy foaming cleanser gently yet thoroughly removes pollution, dirt, excess oil and makeupReveals smoother, clearer skin and maintains skin moisture balanceLeaves dry skin feeling soft and comfortable, never tightNon-drying. Non-strippingDermatologist testedMore sustainable packaging:Tube is minimum 39% post-consumer recycled material, 28% plant-derived plasticCap is 25% post-consumer recycled materialNon-acnegenicAllergy testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare scienceClinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skinKey IngredientsFormulated with glycerin and hyaluronic acid for a softer, more conditioning cleanse.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesDenatured AlcoholSynthetic ColorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2276493How To UseLather cleanser between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off. Follow with Clarifying Lotion to clear the way for smoother, brighter skin.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Coco-Betaine, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Sapindus Mukurossi Peel Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Caffeine, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sucrose, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-7M, Hexylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather cleanser between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off. Follow with Clarifying Lotion to clear the way for smoother, brighter skin.

reviews.headline: Quite PO'd‚Ä¶ ingredients not accurate!
reviews.comments: Just received this in my order, and I looked at the ingredients on the back because the bottle i received looks a teeny bit different than the one shown here; the ingredients lists are WILDLY DIFFERENT!  I came to this product's Q&A sections wondering if anyone asked about this already; i found what i was looking for and can confirm that what is listed here is not accurate, in fact the product i recieved isn't even available for sale anywhere on Ulta's website/app (i will include pictures if possible).  I really wanted what is listed for sale here: a foaming cleanser that does not contain myristic acid, palmitic acid, lauric acid, or stearic acid‚Ä¶ as these ingredients are known pore-cloggers (at least in my experience they are).  The listed product (and its ingredients list) are non-comedogenic, and the product i got will would break me out like crazy!  I'm going to go to a local Ulta store and pray that i can a) find the correct product, and b) exchange this version i received for what i actually paid for!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this face wash. It is slightly foaming and feels great on my skin and leaves it feeling sqeaky clean

reviews.headline: Best of the line!
reviews.comments: Out of all the All About Clean facial cleaners this one is the best one! It lathers so nicely and leaves skin noticeably fresh afterwards.

reviews.headline: I definitely love ‚ù§Ô∏è this product

reviews.headline: Clinique All About Clean
reviews.comments: Yes, I will buy this again.  I like the foaming aspect of the face wash and being for dry and very dry skin, it makes my skin feel not only clean but moist and soft.

reviews.headline: I  have purchased this cleanser many times
reviews.comments: This cleanser works great for normal to dry skin. I prefer a cleanser that works with water and this one is great. You only need a small amount so it goes a long way

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I love this face wash it leaves skin feeling soft and clean!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: I have been using Clinique for many years.  This cleanser make my skin feel soft and smooth.

reviews.headline: I always used this
reviews.comments: None

reviews.headline: DONT SLEEP ON THIS
reviews.comments: My favorite facial wash ever. My face has nevet felt softer. My pores are finally clean!

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: Disappointed that I spent so much on a wash wash  for dry skin just for it to make my skin dryer.

reviews.headline: Cleansing and Gentle on Skin
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser. it isn't drying like other cleansers. I have mature skin that is dry. I also really like this cleanser with a sonic brush, it creates a little buffer so the brush isn't to harsh on my skin

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: I love this product.my face is clean,soft, and moisturized

reviews.headline: This is one of my favorites and must haves.
reviews.comments: I have combination skin. (Note: I am not extremely acne prone) I love the way this cleaner makes my skin look and feel.

reviews.headline: Favorite Face Wash
reviews.comments: I have tried many Clinique face washes and this is my favorite for my dry skin. My skin feels clean and soft after washing it.

reviews.headline: Great and effective cleanser
reviews.comments: I was looking for a fragrance free cleanser and that was a very short list of options. This product lathers well and only requires a small dab to clean. I wear mineral sunscreen daily and it removed it with ease. I didnt need a seperate cleanser to remove makeup, it easily got rid of my long wearing foundation. I didnt use it to remove my eye makeup. I stick to micellar water for that. My face feels squeeky clean afterwards, but not overly dry. I just wished this version came in more sizes like the pink version. I should mention that i have sensitive skin that usually dislikes new products but i had no problem with this one. So its my new cleanser and im very happy.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I'm a Clinique junkie. This is my favorite face wash by far. Leaves my skin so fresh. I do the three step system. 1. This wash 2. Exfoliate (step2) 3. Moisturizer

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years with my sonic brush I the shower every day. Perfect for my fair skin.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I have always used neuteogena brand for my face care to lomit my budget. But my skin has never been what i wanted. I decided to budge & buy a cleanser, eye cream & moisturizer from clinique & my skin has never been better. It has cleared up (no breakouts), softer, less red. Really love this line! Never going back. These products are genuinely good for your skin.

reviews.headline: It made my face dry & tender
reviews.comments: It made my face dry & tender. I returned it.

media.headline: Perfect! I wish it was available in the jumbo size.
media.caption: Old packaging. Great products for dry skin!

faceoff_positive.comments: I just purchased this to use with my sonic cleanser. I absolutely love it!!!! I like a lot of foaming action with this type of cleaner and this product delivers. Face feels super clean. Another hit Clinique!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Lots of foam!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have loved every Clinique skincare product I have purchased, and I really wanted to love this soap, but it is a huge miss for my skin. I usually use type 2 soap but type 1 clarifiying lotion and 1-2 lotion in my 3-step regimen. I have only been able to use this sonic soap once a day, as it absolutely strips my skin, and I have done nothing but break out (in both blemishes and dry patches) since I started using it. Some of the foam got up into my nose one time and it burned like crazy, but that was nothing compared to when some ran into my eye in the shower. I am so grateful that I started using the sonic cleansing brush well before I tried this soap, or I might not have given the brush a chance. The brush is fabuous, and when used with my regular Clinique liquid cleansing soap, it's amazing. But with this soap, my skin feels tight, breaks out in blemishes and dry patches, and never looks hydrated or bright. Such a huge disappointment! :(
faceoff_negative.headline: Epic Fail :(
